plot: The daily trials and tribulations of the inhabitants of an uncharted island, all of whom are living piñata animals.
plot_en: The daily trials and tribulations of the inhabitants of an uncharted island, all of whom are living piñata animals.
plot_es: The daily trials and tribulations of the inhabitants of an uncharted island, all of whom are living piñata animals.
title: Viva Piñata
